==Dialogue==
===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Kamisato Ayaka)
:{{A|vo card ayaka invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I am honored to have the opportunity to exchange techniques with you.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Zero Hour Invokation|Zero Hour Invokation]] interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Kamisato Ayaka's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Well played.

;(When the player defeats two of Kamisato Ayaka's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' This is quite the predicament...

;(When Kamisato Ayaka defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Seems my luck's not bad today.

;(When Kamisato Ayaka uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Enlighten me... hehe.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' You seem to have gotten careless.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I'm happy to have played such a good match.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Kamisato Ayaka)
:{{A|vo card ayaka invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Hehe, please allow me to learn from your skills.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Kamisato Ayaka's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I will not stand for this...

;(When the player defeats two of Kamisato Ayaka's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' How humiliating...

;(When Kamisato Ayaka defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' ...My apologies.

;(When Kamisato Ayaka uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card ayaka ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' As they say in chess: "Check."

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Hmm, were you distracted during our match?

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' What an astonishing play.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Kamisato Ayaka)
:{{A|vo card ayaka freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I've heard that Genius Invokation TCG is a lot of fun and that the cards are exquisitely illustrated. Perhaps they would make good collector's items.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG challenge interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card ayaka leave 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Oh, are you leaving now? Um... would you wait a moment? I'll go with you.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka endofgame win 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' You'll never defeat me if you're too gentle, you know?

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka endofgame fail 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I admire your impressive card skills.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Zero Hour Invokation: Secchu Tou===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Kamisato Ayaka)
:{{A|vo card ayaka event invite start 01.ogg}}  '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' We're in a real competition, so please don't feel obliged to go easy on me.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Zero Hour Invokation interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::{{A|vo card ayaka event invite leave 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I'll be looking into building a more optimal deck. It's a formal competition after all, and I shouldn't make a fool of myself.

;(When the player defeats one of Kamisato Ayaka's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka event ingame 02.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I see you've improved significantly.

;(When the player defeats two of Kamisato Ayaka's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka event ingame 03.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' It's not over yet...

;(When Kamisato Ayaka defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card ayaka event ingame 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I will not allow myself to fall behind today.

;(When Kamisato Ayaka uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card ayaka event ingame 04.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I'll finish with... this!

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka event invite win 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Were you distracted during our match? Hehe, I could tell.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card ayaka event invite fail 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Phew... I really was beaten by the best.
{{Dialogue End}}
